overview: As BeInSync’s chief VP of research and development, co-founder Sharon Carmel oversees strategic product development and drives the global market vision for BeInSync’s next-generation anywhere data access solution. Previously, Sharon was a founder and served as CTO and the vice president of R&D at Emblaze (LSE:BLZ.L), a leading provider of media centric end-to-end solutions for wireless multimedia. While at Emblaze, Sharon led the company’s transition to the mobile wireless market and was responsible for several multi-million dollar deals with Samsung Wireless.
